title: Executive Order 11427-Terminating the Maritime Advisory Committee
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, the Maritime Advisory Committee established by Executive Order No. 11156 of June 17, 1964, is hereby terminated and that order is revoked.
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11427-Terminating the Maritime Advisory Committee Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306351
